amendment.description: To strike the limitations on changes to mail delivery schedule, with an offset.

action.text: Amendment SA 2043 proposed by Senator Udall NM to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2043, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 72.
